\subsection{Stage 4: AI-Enhanced
Chatbot}\label{stage-4-ai-enhanced-chatbot}}

\textbf{After Chapter 25: Python for AI Integration}

\begin{Shaded}
\begin{Highlighting}[]
\CommentTok{\# Enhance your chatbot with AI capabilities}
\ImportTok{import}\NormalTok{ os}
\ImportTok{from}\NormalTok{ dotenv }\ImportTok{import}\NormalTok{ load\_dotenv}
\ImportTok{import}\NormalTok{ openai  }\CommentTok{\# You\textquotesingle{}ll need to pip install openai}

\CommentTok{\# Load API key from environment variable}
\NormalTok{load\_dotenv()}
\NormalTok{openai.api\_key }\OperatorTok{=}\NormalTok{ os.getenv(}\StringTok{"OPENAI\_API\_KEY"}\NormalTok{)}

\KeywordTok{class}\NormalTok{ AIEnhancedChatbot(Chatbot):}
    \CommentTok{"""A chatbot enhanced with AI capabilities."""}
    
    \KeywordTok{def} \FunctionTok{\_\_init\_\_}\NormalTok{(}\VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{, name}\OperatorTok{=}\StringTok{"AI{-}PyBot"}\NormalTok{):}
        \BuiltInTok{super}\NormalTok{().}\FunctionTok{\_\_init\_\_}\NormalTok{(name)}
        \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.ai\_mode }\OperatorTok{=} \VariableTok{False}
        \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.conversation\_context }\OperatorTok{=}\NormalTok{ []}
    
    \KeywordTok{def}\NormalTok{ toggle\_ai\_mode(}\VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{):}
        \CommentTok{"""Toggle between rule{-}based and AI{-}powered responses."""}
        \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.ai\_mode }\OperatorTok{=} \KeywordTok{not} \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.ai\_mode}
        \ControlFlowTok{return} \SpecialStringTok{f"AI mode is now }\SpecialCharTok{\{}\StringTok{\textquotesingle{}on\textquotesingle{}} \ControlFlowTok{if} \VariableTok{self}\SpecialCharTok{.}\NormalTok{ai\_mode }\ControlFlowTok{else} \StringTok{\textquotesingle{}off\textquotesingle{}}\SpecialCharTok{\}}\SpecialStringTok{"}
    
    \KeywordTok{def}\NormalTok{ get\_ai\_response(}\VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{, user\_input):}
        \CommentTok{"""Get a response from the OpenAI API."""}
        \CommentTok{\# Add to conversation context}
        \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.conversation\_context.append(\{}\StringTok{"role"}\NormalTok{: }\StringTok{"user"}\NormalTok{, }\StringTok{"content"}\NormalTok{: user\_input\})}
        
        \ControlFlowTok{try}\NormalTok{:}
            \CommentTok{\# Get response from OpenAI}
\NormalTok{            response }\OperatorTok{=}\NormalTok{ openai.ChatCompletion.create(}
\NormalTok{                model}\OperatorTok{=}\StringTok{"gpt{-}3.5{-}turbo"}\NormalTok{,}
\NormalTok{                messages}\OperatorTok{=}\NormalTok{[}
\NormalTok{                    \{}\StringTok{"role"}\NormalTok{: }\StringTok{"system"}\NormalTok{, }\StringTok{"content"}\NormalTok{: }\SpecialStringTok{f"You are }\SpecialCharTok{\{}\VariableTok{self}\SpecialCharTok{.}\NormalTok{name}\SpecialCharTok{\}}\SpecialStringTok{, a helpful assistant chatbot. Respond in a friendly, concise manner."}\NormalTok{\},}
                    \OperatorTok{*}\VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.conversation\_context}
\NormalTok{                ]}
\NormalTok{            )}
            
            \CommentTok{\# Extract and save the assistant\textquotesingle{}s response}
\NormalTok{            ai\_response }\OperatorTok{=}\NormalTok{ response.choices[}\DecValTok{0}\NormalTok{].message[}\StringTok{"content"}\NormalTok{]}
            \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.conversation\_context.append(\{}\StringTok{"role"}\NormalTok{: }\StringTok{"assistant"}\NormalTok{, }\StringTok{"content"}\NormalTok{: ai\_response\})}
            
            \CommentTok{\# Keep context window manageable (retain last 10 exchanges)}
            \ControlFlowTok{if} \BuiltInTok{len}\NormalTok{(}\VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.conversation\_context) }\OperatorTok{\textgreater{}} \DecValTok{20}\NormalTok{:}
                \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.conversation\_context }\OperatorTok{=} \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.conversation\_context[}\OperatorTok{{-}}\DecValTok{20}\NormalTok{:]}
                
            \ControlFlowTok{return}\NormalTok{ ai\_response}
            
        \ControlFlowTok{except} \PreprocessorTok{Exception} \ImportTok{as}\NormalTok{ e:}
            \ControlFlowTok{return} \SpecialStringTok{f"AI error: }\SpecialCharTok{\{}\BuiltInTok{str}\NormalTok{(e)}\SpecialCharTok{\}}\SpecialStringTok{"}
    
    \KeywordTok{def}\NormalTok{ get\_response(}\VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{, user\_input):}
        \CommentTok{"""Get a response using either rule{-}based or AI approach."""}
        \ControlFlowTok{if}\NormalTok{ user\_input.lower() }\OperatorTok{==} \StringTok{"ai mode"}\NormalTok{:}
            \ControlFlowTok{return} \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.toggle\_ai\_mode()}
            
        \ControlFlowTok{if} \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.ai\_mode:}
            \ControlFlowTok{return} \VariableTok{self}\NormalTok{.get\_ai\_response(user\_input)}
        \ControlFlowTok{else}\NormalTok{:}
            \ControlFlowTok{return} \BuiltInTok{super}\NormalTok{().get\_response(user\_input)}
\end{Highlighting}
\end{Shaded}

\hypertarget{project-challenges-and-extensions}{%
\section{Project Challenges and
Extensions}\label{project-challenges-and-extensions}}

As you become more comfortable with Python, try these challenges to
enhance your chatbot further:

\begin{enumerate}
\def\labelenumi{\arabic{enumi}.}
\item
  \textbf{Sentiment Analysis}: Analyze the sentiment of user messages
  and adjust responses accordingly.
\item
  \textbf{Web Integration}: Make your chatbot accessible via a simple
  web interface using Flask.
\item
  \textbf{Voice Capabilities}: Add text-to-speech and speech-to-text
  capabilities.
\item
  \textbf{Knowledge Base}: Create a system for your chatbot to learn
  facts and retrieve them when asked.
\item
  \textbf{Multi-language Support}: Add the ability to detect and respond
  in different languages.
\end{enumerate}

\hypertarget{how-to-use-this-guide}{%
\section{How to Use This Guide}\label{how-to-use-this-guide}}

\begin{enumerate}
\def\labelenumi{\arabic{enumi}.}
\tightlist
\item
  Work through the book chapters in order
\item
  When you reach a chapter mentioned in this guide, implement the
  corresponding chatbot enhancements
\item
  Test and experiment with the chatbot after each implementation
\item
  By the end of the book, you'll have a sophisticated AI-enhanced
  chatbot built entirely by you!
\end{enumerate}

Remember: This project is meant to be flexible. Feel free to customize
your chatbot, add your own features, and make it truly yours!
